title: To Reach New Heights….
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Umi-chan, you don’t have to be so depressed…. Don’t you think Kanan-chan doesn’t think much of it either?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>….To have forgotten that we are fellow school idols who work hard together and learn from each other and went on a rant about the wonders of the mountains…. No, it’s true that I do think all of humanity should know the wonders of the mountains. But if Kanan is willing to say that much, the sea must also have a charm that I do not know of…. Haa, I’m so immature….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hmm, I don’t think it’s bad to preach about stuff that you love. If it was me, I would’ve been happy to be able to understand other party<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Thank you for your support, Nozomi…. But it’s true that I’m lacking mental discipline. I’m ashamed to even look Kanan in the face….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Don’t be so down, let’s move your body. You’ll feel better that way! ….That’s right! How about you think up a training plan that combines the good points of both the sea and the mountains with Kanan-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>A plan that combines the two…. Nozomi! What a great idea!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You can make use of each of your expertise to make a great training plan♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes, that’s right. I can also put mental training in it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Alright then, let’s contact Kanan-chan immediately<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Okay! You can also help us, Nozomi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
